website_summaries.verdict: Provides a long-lasting energy boost for your growing pup.
pros: Provides a boost of energy that lasts throughout the day
Free of gluten, corn, wheat, and soy
Small kibbles are easy to eat
cons: Food sits at a high price point

customer_reviews.title: We are quite satisfied with the results
customer_reviews.text: Our pup came home at 9 weeks having been started on Victor. We are quite satisfied with the results, our German Shepherd pup loves this food, she is a long haired shepherd and her coat is shiny and smooth. Her stools are well formed and no issues with gas or diarrhea. We will continue to purchase Victor products.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: When looking for a good food for our 10 week old puppy
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a good food for our 10 week old puppy, my husband and I wanted to get something grain free with high ratings. Victor grain free active dog and puppy formula does not disappoint! Our puppy transitioned wonderfully from Purina to Victor with no messes. When he was on Purina, he was very smelly, but he's not smelly at all on Victor. This is a great quality food, and actually pretty affordable compared to other 5 star dog foods.
customer_reviews.author: KelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Least expensive 5 Star Grain Free Food
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 5 star food! Makes the list of 5 star foods on dogfoodadvisor.com That's enough for me. You can feed it to your puppy to your senior dog. Look at all that meat! Read the label folks. I have been feeding this for over half of my SEVENTEEN year olds life. He has never once been sick and gets around fine other than a little bit of arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph & Angela

customer_reviews.title: The breeder recommended this food and our pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: The breeder recommended this food and our pup loves it. He’s super farty, but it’s becomming less over time. I think he was more gaseous earlier as he was recently transitioned to kibble. His stools aren’t exactly solid and he does have some runs, but again, he’s 9 weeks and I’ll give him time to adjust, because he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: cfna1987

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent food for our newest pup. Will buy locally from now on as it is less expensive than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Charkley

customer_reviews.title: Switching to this food cleared up a horrible skin condition!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality food!!! My dogs immune system was compromised after being given the bordatella shot & was having horrible reactions to the food I had always given him (awful red scabs all over his body and constantly itching). As last result (because I didn’t want to go back to the vet) I switched him to this grain-free food and it CLEARED everything up. No useless vet visit or medications, just switching to this food was enough to change it all around! He even seems to be enjoying his food more these days. I’m super grateful that he’s healthy and happy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price went up in less than 10 days
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good brand of food. I do feel bad leaving a negative review. I have been paying 38.99 on amazon for this same bag and today when I logged on to order another bag the price got raised to 54.99. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Vidalia

customer_reviews.title: BAD BAG
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, but this bag was so damaged when I received it. When I found the box outside my home it was covered in ants. When I moved it I could hear loose food inside and once I opened the box I found the bag torn open and half emptied out into the box it came in. So many ants there is no way I am going to feed this stuff to my dog. I had to throw everything out. VERY DISAPPOINTED and not be ordering this again from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kimfromfla

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line food at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my dogs Instinct Raw Boost for years. I have two big dogs, one with digestive issues, and then added a third big dog to my pack, so that brand of food was too expensive when I have to buy a 21lb bag every week or so. Dog Food Advisor gave this 5 stars, so I tried it. My problem dog didn't have any problems at all transitioning to this food, and my Great Pyrenees with allergies has had no issues. I am extremely pleased with this food. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Victor is quality food.
customer_reviews.text: My GSD pup's on her 3rd bag of this. She's satisfied and I'm glad! My other GSD eats the Victor Professional, he's happy, too! Now my daughter & son-in-law feed their Lab/Pit dogs the Victor Hero and are quite satisfied, as well. AND my other daughter feeds her herding dogs the Victor Professional which they do quite well on! No, I'm really not a Victor spokesperson, but I could be, huh?
customer_reviews.author: C. Touchette

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Victor is one of the best dog foods vs. price on the market, I agree. But I wish they had a dedicated puppy formula. My active teenager GSD loved this but my GSD new pup, not so much. I have tried a few different kibbles with my pup. But that could be to a lot of factors including fat content and who knows what other manufacturers add to their food to enhance the taste. Frankly, the junk kibbles that my pup likes the most, I feed her in limited quantities. So I will continue to use Victor. And in the future if there is a puppy formula, I will buy for my future pups.
customer_reviews.author: j p.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Food
customer_reviews.text: Have been waiting for Victor foods to be available, Thank You Amazon!! Nothing compares in content or quality in Victor foods, just read the labels. Dogs require less amount per feed to meet adequate nutrition. Less stool & consistently normal. Prebiotics, Omega's & Vit's necessary from natural sources. USA family business in TX. Best available for all life stages.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Simply “The Best”!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love Victor Dog Food! We have a Pug, Chihuahua, Rottweiler /Shepherd Mix and a German Shepherd pup. We read up and we’re recommended Victor from the breeder of our pup. We transitioned them all onto Victor and couldn’t be happier. And the biggest thing we’ve noticed is the shedding shedding is greatly reduced and their coats are so soft. German Shepherds SHED and their coats can be coarse. My Shepherd is so soft and I no longer have hair everywhere. Totally impressed with Victor and all the great benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila ♥

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: We have had labradors for 25 years and have used quality feeding products. We were recommend this product for our new puppy. She not only loves it but eats it dry also. Our 2 other labs are constantly trying to eat her food! Very pleased with this American made product.
customer_reviews.author: D Ackers

customer_reviews.title: ... my 4 month old Male German Shepherd and we LOVE IT! His coat is so beautiful and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this food for a few months now for my 4 month old Male German Shepherd and we LOVE IT! His coat is so beautiful and I know its because of this food because before we came across this suggestion from the German Shepherd Man on youtube, we were giving him Blue Diamond and his coat was no where near are pretty, shiny and healthy. His bowels are always healthy looking too (if that isn't too much info lol) and he's so so intelligent. All in all we really love this brand and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Catarina Martinez

customer_reviews.title: My puppy hates it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this food its because the previous owner was feeding it to my puppy before I got him. But my Siberian husky hates it. He doesnt like beef at all or maybe just the horrible smell of this dry food. Some people say it's a great food with consumer report giving it a good review, but for some reason I dont even find it at pet supermarket or Petco or petsmart. Now to be fair. My 10 weeks puppy had a lot of energy and looked healthy. The coat didn't shine while feeding him this food. Now if you have a husky I'll recommend wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Dany Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product & seller customer service was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Pyrenees loves this dog food. We were buying the smaller bag but he going through so fast we needed the 30 lb bag. When it arrived the bag had busted open & some food was lost. I contacted seller & they went the extra mile to rectify the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We were having a hard time finding a dog food that fit both of our dogs diets. A friend suggested we try this and they both absolutely love it. We have a 7 month old Frenchie and 4 year old English Bulldog who both eat this daily. Our EB is usually very picky on her food but she was able to transition to this food quite easy. I love it because the nutrients and it’s made their poop easier to pick up. Best part is their gas isn’t nearly as bad as it used to be!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredient dog food. I feel this is the best food for my American Bully. I researched for hours to find the best dry dog food for our pup. My mind is at ease knowing he is getting all the nourishment he needs. He is growing like crazy, he has bright eyes and a healthy coat. I will continue this food forever. He’s been on it four months now and see nothing but great results. He loves the food and finishes it up every time.
customer_reviews.author: Beach lover

customer_reviews.title: Great brand! All the flavors! Not that I eat them myself.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the Victor brand dog food for two years now. My dogs love it! I did my research, and never have I seen Victor recalled. None of its flavors. I love how the kibbles are tiny too. I have French bulldogs and it’s nice to have the smaller kibble for them. I wish it weren’t so pricey, but that is the only drawback for me. It is still worth it and I still keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: New puppy, wanted everyone to eat the same food, at first my big dogs didn't act too crazy about it but after a few days they insist on this over their TOTW prairie, so now they will all eat VICTOR. I'm very pleased with the ingredient list and the excellent rating from Dogfoodadvisor.com I think I have that right.
customer_reviews.author: 0591courseydr

customer_reviews.title: The BEST handsdown
customer_reviews.text: Puppy raised on Victor & will stay on Victor for life. Even older finicky eater is eating it when he thinks no one is watching, lol. Hopefully he'll switch permanately as well. His skin dermitita caused by another dry brand glutens has cleared up from only his stealing nibbles. I can imagine a new beautiful coat again if eaten regularly & solely. Puppy though, will announce it's mealtime! He wants his Victor! And NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breeder recommended
customer_reviews.text: My breeder recommended this for her large breed puppies during their first year, because it contains the proper phosphorus/calcium ratio for growing bones. My puppy is happy and healthy. He loves this stuff. . .wet or dry!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalogal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very finicky dog! She hates most dog food! Lots of dog food hates her too, if you know what I mean! So far so good with this. I'm still in the mixing stages to wean her off of her old food but she seems to like this and the colon issue that the old food caused are going away.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: We love Victor!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased and English Bulldog puppy. We didn't know what to feed him, so we started with what thought was a good dog food (from commercials)... Blue Diamond. Boy were we wrong he had wet stool or diarrhea everyday. We tried Victor and he's hasn't been sick since and he's gained weight! He's gorgeous! We live in AL and haven't been able to find it in the stores so Amazon has been our only resource. it's a little pricey but it seems well worth it. My dog loves it and we're all very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: BUG INFESTED BAG
customer_reviews.text: I’m super grossed out. There are bugs in this food, obviously eggs that hatched into the tiny flying moths that eat dry dog food. It was infested in my dogs feeder. I didn’t know what it was until I looked it up and realized they’re in the entire bag of food. Can I somehow get a new bag??? This is a lot of money to waste and have bug infested dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: The food is a small kibble. The smell of the food is horrid, stool smells just as bad. 5-month-old Rhodesian Ridgeback didn't seem to enjoy it as much as the last brand of food. Started her on it 5 days ago, for the last 3 days she's had cow pie consistency bowel moments. So bad to the point that she can't contain herself in her crate for an hour in the morning before she goes to daycare. She's never had an accident prior to this.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Victor Dog Food Grain-Free is a Grand Dog Food For Healthy Dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Victor Dog Food has made the Siberian Husky's G.I. tract be normal. I often boil a chicken (bland) and put some of the juice on it for more flavor and all 3 huskies love it. I tried a different bag of this food, but the dog that needs this bag had an upset stomach when I used it. He must have grain free. This one worked for G.I. problems, so we will be sticking with this one from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Good food but to expensive
customer_reviews.text: This food made my dogs farts and crap stink BAD! Plus there are better foods out there for less money. I'm not dissatisfied with the food. It's just not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Norton

customer_reviews.title: Not a high quality food
customer_reviews.text: I gave this food to my puppy but soon found out that it’s not a good quality food. It made my sweet baby extremely itchy. I stopped this food and started him on honest Kitchen and the itch is gone.
customer_reviews.author: comfortfirst

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: I buy two different flavors, puppy chow and elderly food, both dogs love it, I never have a problem with them being finicky with Victor foods. I’ve tried others thinking to save money, that was a costly mistake, I ended up donating the food. My dogs benefit and are much happier poochies with their Victor food. Thanks Victor for being there and delivery time is awesome also.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for French Bulldog Puppies!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands like Royal Canine, Blue, Nutrish from Rachel Ray....and my 2 Frenchie pups' poops were EXTREMELY SMELLY and SOFT! Horrendous gas, too! And YES, I know Frenchies are known for gas! But that's where this food comes in! My two puppies LOVE the food. Not only that, but their poop comes out FIRM, HEALTHY, with MINIMAL SMELL! The food seems to have mitigated the smell of their farts as well. HOORAY! For the Frenchie owners out there, and dog owners in general....I highly recommend this food!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog food for athlete dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We raise Chesapeake Bay Retrievers, this is the only dog food that keeps down the smell of their coats and keeps them in prime condition. This was for a litter of pups and it was cheaper through Amazon than going to the Local farm supply store.
customer_reviews.author: alikaye

customer_reviews.title: best dog food
customer_reviews.text: best dog food ever. our girl has been on it since she could start eating dry food. looks and feels fabulous. highly recommend for any breed or size dog.
customer_reviews.author: LeoKrog

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, protein-packed content too heavy for puppies
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the protein-packed content is too heavy for puppies. It should be a few percentages down. My four month German Shorthaired Pointer struggled with diarrhea for two weeks, it was a sad experience for us all.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Macias

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pup
customer_reviews.text: My German shepherd pup loves this food !! She eats it right away and no digestive issues ! She's 12 weeks old, full of energy, and is growing very fast ! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rose L

customer_reviews.title: Best puppy food ever
customer_reviews.text: Best puppy food ever! Fills dog up. High strung deaf puppy eats food.... is calm..... goes to sleep! I you have ever reduced a deaf dog, you know how sweet sleepy is. Made all the difference in her health & her training.
customer_reviews.author: Ann George

customer_reviews.title: My puppy wasn’t interested in the food.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old puppy was interested in this food for about a day then walked away.
customer_reviews.author: Pookiebeardog

customer_reviews.title: the only reason to buy the good stuff is to cut down on yard waste
customer_reviews.text: High quality dog food. As far as I can tell, the only reason to buy the good stuff is to cut down on yard waste. Higher quality = higher digestibility = less poop.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyB

customer_reviews.title: Great for my American Bullies
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy my dogs BullyMax and spend over $100 a bag. Victors has the exact same ingredients in the same percentages as the expensive food. Victors is half the price and it ships in two days with Prime. My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for growing puppies
customer_reviews.text: My Mini Australian Shepherd won't eat anything else. I believe this is the best food for a growing high energy puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Ma duce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just a little too big for a 3# puppy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: The Mercedes of Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Top sporting dog breeders prefer Victor's, high protein, good absorption, for puppies and active dogs. My Pointer and Springer love this food. Don't get sucked into repeated advertising by big dog food companies, read ur ingredients. Its worth it to spend a little more.
customer_reviews.author: mermaid starboard

customer_reviews.title: One of the best for your dog
customer_reviews.text: Victor was recommended by the breeder I used. I then did some on line research and found that this particular type of Victor was rated 5 stars by several agencies. This is the highest possible rating and not may relieve it. Since using it, several of my friends have switched to it and their dogs love it and are doing very well. If your dog has some allergies, try a small bag and see how they do. Only on dog I know of did not do well with this particular type of Victor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Food is excellent, dog likes it and coat is shiny and ...
customer_reviews.text: Food is excellent, dog likes it and coat is shiny and soft. Shipping charges are a bit exhorbitant and a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bullies!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the expensive side but this small company makes a quality product. My bully loves it! Great alternative to the bully specific goods on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Egermain

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Grain Free Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a dog trainer. Our puppy loves it. Wish there was less “meal” products and more meats in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family member that has a female dog that just had puppies. She seems to love the flavor and it provides nutrients needed for nursing puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: We love this food
customer_reviews.text: We love this food, it is very high quality for a reasonable price and our pup seems to be a fan too. It is a fair price too for a high quality dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing food, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My Pup has started his 2nd bag now, he absolutely loves this food. When i got him from the breeder he had dandruff so bad, now his coat is so soft silky smooth. I would recommend this food. My only complaint is the price. But I'm going to keep him on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Australian Shepherd puppy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Australian Shepherd puppy! Just the right amount of protein, fats and carbs! He LOVES it and is growing like a weed, has a beautiful soft and glossy coat.
customer_reviews.author: Sybarite

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value and pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: My growing schnoodle puppy loves this food, well she loves all food. This is a great deal for the nutrition. I’ve been spending a fortune in Blue buffalo and Nulo until I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy London

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it snd has the shiniest coat I have ever seen on a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the Grain-Free thing. Dogs in the wild will not go eat an ear of corn. Dr. Doctor, Howard Garret, recommends this brand. I was using Blue Buffalo. Anyway, this is good. The price is better than what I pay for Blue Buffalo at Petsmart AND I get it delivered right to my front door. Its a NO Brainer!
customer_reviews.author: M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food !
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had any issues with my pit bulls eating this food, besides the poop being extra smelly lol. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Scratch and itch relief
customer_reviews.text: I changed to Victor do to my dog's food allergies. I am pleased to report that the constant scratching has greatly diminished and his coat has never been mote shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Hampster01

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Great high-quality 5-star dog food, my dogs love it. I have also purchased the Victor Cat Food for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Victor dog food is hard to find locally
customer_reviews.text: Our Breeder recommended this brand for our Bernese/Doodle mix puppy and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JND from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Victor Puppy Beef Meal
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the smell of this food. Gave my 6 mo old dog black looking loose stools
customer_reviews.author: Cameron'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this, and I love that I dont have to go to the store and carry/ load this in and out of the cart and the car!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Helped with digestion and diarrhea.
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it. Helped harden her stools which is why I purchased it. She was having problems with her anal glands. But she loves it so much, it makes me happy that I switched. She is excited to eat every time now. Had it about 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles41

customer_reviews.title: Superior food-none better
customer_reviews.text: Have used various premium food with my collies since 1957. Started this food 6 years ago with the best results I have had with my dogs. Solid elimination,no left over food and my guys even love it as a treat reward.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Carter

customer_reviews.title: My boxer and lab mix love it. Their coats are shiny
customer_reviews.text: This is a top of the line dog food. My boxer and lab mix love it. Their coats are shiny. The only complaint that I have is the price. My local pet store price is much lower.
customer_reviews.author: brian major

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like it, but he’d eat anything regardless. It did hardened his stool so that’s a good sign. It sure smells bad and I’m pretty sure it has given him bad breath. Otherwise it has been good
customer_reviews.author: diego espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand
customer_reviews.text: Can't rate taste personally but my dogs seem to love it 😁
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-month old puppy loves the food, and the food supplies excellent nutrition. I can clearly see her growth - she used to be a bit shorter, and now she is much stronger. I'd recommend Victor dog food to every pet owner.
customer_reviews.author: Spmp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality grain free dog food. Recommended to me by a long time dog breeder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves it and if I may say on here the poop is easy to pick up!!! Keep it natural!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gordley

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: He learned to love it. We will try something else next time
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: Great Food! We have 3 dogs. They love the food they look great also!
customer_reviews.author: Joline Pebley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nursing dog loves it. I love victor dog food and this will be my first time having my female eat victor puppy food.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree T.

customer_reviews.title: Horrific Smell
customer_reviews.text: The 1st and 2nd bags I got, didn’t have the smell the 3rd and 4th did. The product had a foul “stink bait” smell associated with it, that would wreak the whole house. Just didn’t make sense since the first couple bags we got were not this bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: FJ Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This food is great my dog seems to like it his stools together much better.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old husky and 7 month old labradoodle. Food can be expensive especially when you have to purchase two different kinds. We love Victor dog food because both of them can have it and they love it! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Zgrrman

customer_reviews.title: Made in the US and no recalls.
customer_reviews.text: My niece recommended this brand to me for our new rescue and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Still they fart !! Lolol
customer_reviews.text: We decided to go w red paws, better food for athletic dogs,, however this food is good, !!
customer_reviews.author: Koda McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag I ordered online. The first bag was great. However, the second bag is not. The smell of the food is off and my dog has thrown up two days in a row. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves the food. A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of food in this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that for the price, this food was out of my budget, however, due to the size of the kibble, this bag seems to last a long time! My dog likes it and her stools are normal after changing-over.
customer_reviews.author: shelley dixon

customer_reviews.title: We love Victor
customer_reviews.text: No longer use, bc we are no longer grain free. Otherwise a great product if not feeding raw.
customer_reviews.author: Dena D.

customer_reviews.title: Two Black German Shepherds
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my two pups with equal satisfied results for them. They are healthy, leave solid stools, and their coats are wonderful and strong and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Albores

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: I like the food for my puppy. It’s good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dinesh

customer_reviews.title: Breeder Recommended - Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great product...on reorder basis. High energy year old Siberian Husky - perfect. Breeder recommended product. Also have senior shih-tzu with special requirements. She loves it (appetite is an issue) and it is small enough for her to chew. Food problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: LadyRose

customer_reviews.title: Super Dog Food!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected and on time. My little shih tzu loves this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My Belgian Malinois absolutely loves this food and his energy levels are fantastic on it. Made the switch from Diamond Naturals to this.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter181

customer_reviews.title: yuck
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after we opened this bag, it was full of bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food. We have a dog that we rescued from Afghanistan and he has always had a sensitive stomach. I didn't realize that it was caused by wheat until recently. The Victor Grain Free has been an answer to prayer.....he loves it!! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality food, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality dog food, comparable to much pricier brands. I love that is is made in the U.S.A. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JulieMKY

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly packed. Fresh food. The bag did not have one wrinkle. Will buy again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: The breeder I bought my puppy from, as well as the vet who is taking care of him, both strongly recommended that I use Victor. Done deal! In four months he has never had diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Pickier Than Most

customer_reviews.title: High Quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love Victor dog food! My Bichon loves it and he’s healthy, active, and happy
customer_reviews.author: OhioGrown83

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food! My chocolate Labrador has a beautiful coat.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: All three of my corgis love this food. They have lost weight using this higher protein product. I do add green beans and pumpkin to the food also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tinky tasty
customer_reviews.text: Tinky loves it as a supplement to his raw diet
customer_reviews.author: SUSIE GENOVA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Value Top Tier dog food I have been able to find.
customer_reviews.author: Prospector

customer_reviews.title: Best Doggone Food Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My American Cocker Spaniel (rescue) went through a few months of trial and error and had a hard time digesting her food. Finally, after months of hits-and-misses, this was the only dog food that agreed with her sensitive tummy. I tried very high end dog food and even those didn't work for her - until this one was suggested. This is the only food I will give her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Long

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't jive with Pomeranians' pallets
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if I got a bad batch....? I have 3 Pomeranians. I mix this in with their standard chicken kibble. All three picked the other hard food out of their dish and left this food sitting. One of my Poms will put this in her mouth and literally spit it out on the floor (piece by piece) as she tries to pick through to eat her chicken kibbles. Perhaps it is because my puppies have not yet been exposed to beef...? It is weird. If they are really really hungry, they will eat it, but it doesn't appear to be something they savor.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: My corgi loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I cant attest to the flavor as I have not tried it but my dogs love this stuff. I wish it was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Daily  Amateur Photographer

customer_reviews.title: My dog (Shi-poo) is a very picky eater but he ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog (Shi-poo) is a very picky eater but he loves this dog food. No more struggles to get him to eat.
customer_reviews.author: North South

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Grrrreat
customer_reviews.text: Our Dogs love this food and would rather have it than their treats! Take their bowls into their kennel and keep on licking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Victor Dog Food Grain-Free Active Dog and Puppy Beef Meal and Sweet Potato
product_meta.description:
Size:30 lb



VICTOR Grain Free Active Dog & Puppy is an excellent choice for growing puppies, pregnant and lactating females, and dogs with high physical demands. This multi-protein, nutrient-dense recipe is specially formulated for dogs with allergies to certain proteins or grains.

VICTOR Grain Free Active Dog & Puppy for Dogs is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for All Life Stages, including growth of large size dogs (70 lb. or more as an adult).

CALORIE CONTENT (Calculated ME):

3614 kcal/kg; 384 kcal/cup 

GUARANTEED ANALYSIS: 

Crude Protein ------------- 33.0% ( Min.), 
Crude Fat ------------------ 16.0% ( Min.), 
Crude Fiber ----------------- 3.8% ( Max.), 
Moisture -------------------- 9.0% ( Max.), 
Linoleic Acid (Omega 6) --- 2.8% ( Min.), 
Linolenic Acid (Omega 3) -- 0.4% ( Min.), 
DHA ------------------------- 0.1% ( Min.), 
Zinc -------------------- 150 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Selenium -------------- 0.35 mg/kg ( Min.), 
Vitamin E ---------------- 150 IU/kg ( Min.), 
L-Carnitine* -------------- 80 mg/kg ( Min.), 

*Not recognized as an essential nutrient by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles

INGREDIENTS: 

 Beef Meal, Peas, Sweet Potato, Chicken Fat (preserved with mixed Tocopherols), Menhaden Fish Meal (source of DHA-Docosahexaenoic Acid), Blood Meal, Garbanzo Beans, Pork Meal, Yeast Culture, Dehydrated Alfalfa Meal, Natural Flavor, Potassium Chloride, Carrot Powder, Tomato Pomace (source of Lycopene), Taurine, Salt, Choline Chloride, Dried Seaweed Meal, Zinc Methionine Complex, Vitamin E Supplement, Hydrolyzed Yeast, Iron Amino Acid Complex, Calcium Carbonate, Manganese Amino Acid Complex, Ferrous Sulfate, L-Carnitine, Selenium Yeast, Copper Sulfate, Niacin Supplement, Vitamin B12 Supplement, D-Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin A Supplement, Thiamine Mononitrate, Biotin, Riboflavin Supplement, Calcium Iodate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Powdered Cellulose, Brewers Dried Yeast, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Dried Aspergillus Oryzae Fermentation Extract, Dried Trichoderma Longibrachiatum Fermentation Extract, Dried Bacillus Subtilis Fermentation Extract, Silicon Dioxide, Tetra Sodium Pyrophosphate, Vegetable Oil, Rosemary Extract, Green Tea Extract, Spearmint Extract, Lecithin, Fructooligosaccharide, Folic Acid, Yucca Schidigera Extract

FEEDING GUIDELINES: 

 Refer to Recommended Feeding Chart for Adult Dogs. 
Number of Cups Per Day (8 oz measuring cup) 

5 lbs. -------- ½ cup 
10 lbs. ------ ⅞ cup 
15 lbs. ------ 1 ¼ cups 
20 lbs. ------ 1 ½ cups 
30 lbs. ------ 2 cups 
40 lbs. ------ 2 ½ cups 
60 lbs. ------ 3 ⅜ cups 
80 lbs. ------ 4 ¼ cups 
100 lbs. ----- 5 cups

Increase feeding intake by ½ cup for every 20 lbs over 100 lbs

FEEDING PUPPIES:

Puppies will typically start nibbling moistened dog foods at 3 to 4 weeks of age. Feed as much as the puppy will eat in 20 minutes in 4 feeding intervals spaced throughout the day. May be mixed with water, broth or milk at a ratio of 3 parts food to 1 part liquid. To ensure product freshness, do not leave moistened food out for more than 30 minutes. Puppies will be weaned from milk by 3 weeks of age. Continue to feed up to 4 times per day. Within a few months, the puppies may be transitioned to a self-feeder. After age one, feed to maintain good body condition, using the feeding chart as a guide.

PREGNANCY AND NURSING:

Energy requirements continually change during stages of gestation and lactation and may require up to four times recommended levels of intake. Adjust amount of food provided to maintain good body condition of your female dog.

TIPS ON TRANSITIONING TO VICTOR:

When changing from a different food to any VICTOR dog food formula, transition your dog to VICTOR over the course of one week to 10 days, gradually increasing the amount of VICTOR every few days.

Keep fresh water available at all times.
feature_bullets: Grain Free for dogs with allergies or sensitivity to grain
Nutrient-dense recipe made with premium-quality beef, pork and fish meals
Ideal for growing puppies and pregnant or lactating females. Also provides sustained energy for sporting dogs and dogs with high physical demands.
Fortified with vitamins, minerals, essential fatty acids, protein and amino acids
Formulated with our scientifically advanced, proven VICTOR Core ingredients to promote healthy immune and digestive systems.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
